name: teammate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a player on the same team
Examples
My teammates are great fun to play with.He felt he had let his teammates down.All her teammates came to visit her in hospital.

Add to word list
a player on someone's team
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who works or plays on the same team as someone else: Let one of your teammates know if you are going to be late for a team meeting. By getting sent off you let down your team-mates.
